result.eng: Your father will be in good health again before long.
result.ga: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfadYour father will be in good health again before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ d'aṫair ina ẛláinte arís sul i ḃfadYour father will be in good health again before long.

result.eng: It will be over before long.
result.ga: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfadIt will be over before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ deireaḋ leis sul i ḃfadIt will be over before long.

result.eng: The boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ga: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís
result.orig: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís
result.html: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arísThe boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an bád ag druidim isteaċ sa ċé agus sul i ḃfad ḃí siad ar ṫalaṁ tirim arísThe boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.

result.eng: I was attending meetings all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag freastal ar chruinnithe an lá ar fad
result.orig: Bhí mé ag freastal ar chruinnithe an lá ar fad
result.html: Bhí mé ag freastal ar chruinnithe an lá ar fadI was attending meetings all day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag freastal ar ċruinniṫe an lá ar fadI was attending meetings all day.

result.eng: I was serving people in the restaurant all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fad
result.orig: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fad
result.html: Bhí mé ag freastal ar dhaoine sa bhialann an lá ar fadI was serving people in the restaurant all day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag freastal ar ḋaoine sa ḃialann an lá ar fadI was serving people in the restaurant all day.

result.eng: They spent tho whole day cutting turf.

result.orig: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint móna
result.html: Chaith siad an lá ar fad ag baint mónaThey spent tho whole day cutting turf.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ siad an lá ar fad ag baint mónaThey spent tho whole day cutting turf.

result.eng: He spent his whole life on the island.

result.orig: Chaith sé a shaol ar fad ar an oileán

result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sé a ẛaol ar fad ar an oileánHe spent his whole life on the island.

result.eng: She spent her whole life doing that work.

result.eng: As far as I know, this is true.

result.ponchtml: A ḟad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.

result.eng: How long did you stay in France?

result.ponchtml: Cá ḟad a d'ḟan tú sa ḞraincHow long did you stay in France?

result.eng: I stayed home the whole day.

result.ponchtml: D'ḟan mé sa ḃaile an lá ar fadI stayed home the whole day.

result.eng: No matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.
result.ga: Dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadh

result.eng: If it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.

result.eng: The meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
